org.fujion.gmaps

Class StreetViewPanoramaOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.gmaps.StreetViewPanoramaOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class StreetViewPanoramaOptions
extends Options
    Options for creating a street view panorama.

    • Field Detail

      • addressControl

        @Option
public Boolean addressControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the address control.

      • addressControlOptions

        @Option
public final StreetViewAddressControlOptions addressControlOptions
        The display options for the address control.

      • clickToGo

        @Option
public Boolean clickToGo
        The enabled/disabled state of click-to-go.

      • disableDefaultUI

        @Option
public Boolean disableDefaultUI
        Enables/disables all default UI. May be overridden individually.

      • disableDoubleClickZoom

        @Option
public Boolean disableDoubleClickZoom
        Enables/disables zoom on double click. Disabled by default.

      • enableCloseButton

        @Option
public Boolean enableCloseButton
        If true, the close button is displayed. Disabled by default.

      • fullscreenControl

        @Option
public Boolean fullscreenControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the fullscreen control.

      • fullscreenControlOptions

        @Option
public final FullscreenControlOptions fullscreenControlOptions
        The display options for the fullscreen control.

      • imageDateControl

        @Option
public Boolean imageDateControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the imagery acquisition date control. Disabled by default.

      • linksControl

        @Option
public Boolean linksControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the links control.

      • motionTracking

        @Option
public Boolean motionTracking
        Whether motion tracking is on or off. Enabled by default when the motion tracking control is present, so that the POV (point of view) follows the orientation of the device. This is primarily applicable to mobile devices. If motionTracking is set to false while motionTrackingControl is enabled, the motion tracking control appears but tracking is off. The user can tap the motion tracking control to toggle this option.

      • motionTrackingControl

        @Option
public Boolean motionTrackingControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the motion tracking control. Enabled by default when the device has motion data, so that the control appears on the map. This is primarily applicable to mobile devices.

      • motionTrackingControlOptions

        @Option
public final MotionTrackingControlOptions motionTrackingControlOptions
        The display options for the motion tracking control.

      • panControl

        @Option
public Boolean panControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the pan control.

      • panControlOptions

        @Option
public final PanControlOptions panControlOptions
        The display options for the pan control.

      • pano

        @Option
public String pano
        The panorama ID, which should be set when specifying a custom panorama.

      • position

        @Option
public LatLng position
        The LatLng position of the Street View panorama.

      • pov

        @Option
public final StreetViewPov pov
        The camera orientation, specified as heading and pitch, for the panorama.

      • scrollwheel

        @Option
public Boolean scrollwheel
        If false, disables scrollwheel zooming in Street View. The scrollwheel is enabled by default.

      • showRoadLabels

        @Option
public Boolean showRoadLabels
        The display of street names on the panorama. If this value is not specified, or is set to true, street names are displayed on the panorama. If set to false, street names are not displayed.

      • visible

        @Option
public Boolean visible
        If true, the Street View panorama is visible on load.

      • zoom

        @Option
public Double zoom
        The zoom of the panorama, specified as a number. A zoom of 0 gives a 180 degrees Field of View.

      • zoomControl

        @Option
public Boolean zoomControl
        The enabled/disabled state of the zoom control.

      • zoomControlOptions

        @Option
public final ZoomControlOptions zoomControlOptions
        The display options for the zoom control.
